component.name: MuseIC

description.p: MuseIC is a fast and simple music player with remote control from any device through internet browser.

ul.li: Play music files and add them to music library
Sort by name, artis and album (it handles ID3 metadata tags)
Connect to the address given by MuseIC and control the media from any device (mobile phone, tablet, etc.) with a web browser

description.p: Any resemblance between the name and some awesome music band is pure coincidence.
